item.title: Second
item.description: #execute as @s run say opposite # Killer's Death/kill streak execute as @s run scoreboard players add @s killStreak 1 execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s deathStreak 0 # PAYOUT calculations execute as @s run scoreboard players operation @s EssencePayout += #baseKillPrice EssenceCost execute as @s run scoreboard players operation @s EssencePayout -= @a[scores={killed=1}] deathStreak execute as @s run scoreboard players operation @s EssencePayout += @a[scores={killed=1}] killStreak execute as @s run scoreboard players operation @s Essence += @s EssencePayout # end functions execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s EssencePayout 0 # Killed's death kill/streak execute as @a[scores={killed=1}] run scoreboard players set @a[scores={killed=1}] killStreak 0 execute as @a[scores={killed=1}] if score @a[scores={killed=1},limit=1] deathStreak < #maxDeathStreak deathStreak run scoreboard players add @s deathStreak 1
